inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to swallow the study drug whole as a tablet
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to take abiraterone on an empty stomach
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to use a method of birth control with adequate barrier protection
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Metastatic disease as documented by positive bone scan or metastatic lesions other than liver or visceral metastasis on CT, MRI
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Asymptomatic or mildly symptomatic from prostate cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previous anti-androgen therapy and progression after withdrawal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active infection or other medical condition that would make corticosteroid use contraindicated
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of pituitary or adrenal dysfunction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by myocardial infarction or arterial thrombotic events in the past 6 months, severe or unstable angina, or NYHA Class III or IV heart disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of hyperlipidemia and MI in his family. He smokes 15 cigarettes per day and drinks a beer per day.
